inventories.info:
A key made of silver, with the shape of a crescent moon carved into it.
Along its shaft, carved in tiny letters, are the words 'Mount Fangcun'.
inventories.name: moonKey

inventories.info:
A sentient golden rod that can shrink or extend itself based on its owner's needs or wishes.
You have a feeling that this rod can be a useful weapon during fights.
inventories.name: goldenCudgel

inventories.info:
A key made of silver, with the shape of a crescent moon carved into it.
Along its shaft, carved in tiny letters, are the words 'Mount Fangcun'.
inventories.name: sunKey

inventories.info:
A diamond key that seems to gleam brightly, even under the silver moonlight.
When you hold it, you feel powerful magic radiating from it. You've never felt anything like it.
inventories.name: diamondKey

inventories.info:
A bronze key with a picture of a roaring lion carved into it. 
When you flip the key, you find that the other side has a picture of a sleepy camel.
inventories.name: lionCamelKey
